Help.Description:
The name 'nop' means 'no operation' and is useful as filler instructions.
Useful for leaving comments in scripts. Make sure to avoid using the '{' and '}' characters in that case.
Help.Example:
Some muds allow you to separate commands using '&', while still allowing players to use it in says or tells. This would allow some devious players to abuse triggers without protection.
If a message contains the '&' character, vulnerable actions will not be triggered. Only one action is allowed to be triggered at a time.
